TopicTitle: To the edge and back: Successfully replicate Apollo 13.

Articles.Content:
Basically what the title says.

Rules:

No dedicated part packs (ex Foamy\'s) however Kerpollo is allowed.

No CFG editing

You must reenact it to the letter (power loss in S-II center engine, 'dock' with LM, adjust FRT so it is lunar orbit insertion, etc.)

Simulate the explosion however you like.

Basically what the title says.

Rules:

No dedicated part packs (ex Foamy\'s) however Kerpollo is allowed.

No CFG editing

Easy as hell. Free return trajectories are simple with an Apoapsis of 14,000KM. Mun sling shots you back... I might try this, but I\'m having a lot of fun with Earth orbit missions right now.
